text: Passport is a 1983 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Thampi Kannanthanam, starring Prem Nazir and Srividya in the lead role. http://spicyonion.com/title/passport-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Prem Nazir as Khader * Madhu as Balan * Srividya as Saraswathi * Jose Prakash as S.P * Captain Raju as Nagedran * Kuthiravattam Pappu as Mollakka * Balan K Nair as Chandrasenan,Vijayasenan * Jalaja as Nabeesa * Kalaranjini as Sainaba * Shanavas as Dancer * TG Ravi as Raghavan * C. I. Paul as S.I Gopinath * Anuradha as Daisy * Meena as Mariamma * Chandraji * Thodupuzha Radhakrishnan as Bose * Master Prashobh as Saraswathi's son * Paravoor Bharathan as Rappai ==References== ==External links== * Category:1983 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Passport (1983 film)
